title: Chasing Lucy
description: Paige Sawyer has her mind made up. She wants Lucy, a rare replica of a famous cherry-red electric guitar that's up for auction at the Young Musician's Benefit Gala. Willing to spend her entire savings on the guitar, she expects it to be an easy win. What she doesn't bargain for is Adam Matthews, a charmingly obnoxious playboy, swooping in to steal Lucy out from under her.
author: Peyton  James
